name: NOT YET
description:
YOU'LL LEAVE THIS WORLD, BUT NOT WITHOUT A FIGHT!

Harness the power of your old bones to win against a series of cruel spirits in this pixel art boss rush!

Swing your trusty cane around and show them that you still have the energy of a young lad!

Controls

- Arrow keys/WASD: Move around, Jump

- Left Control: Swing your cane

- Enter: Start/Restart

Tools used

- Unity 3D

- Aseprite

- FL Studio

Made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 50 Compo

Rate the game here !
